title: Transaction Details
name: XML as NSDictionary
description: The contents of the xml property depend on which type of operation the card reader is responding to. Listed below are all possible keys in the dictionary.  Note that not all fields are included all the time.

elements.name: StatusMessage
elements.description: A human readable description for the returned Status.

elements.name: TransactionType
elements.description: The type of transaction performed: UNDEFINED, SALE, VOID_SALE, REFUND, VOID_REFUND, CANCEL_SALE, CANCEL_REFUND

elements.name: FinancialStatus
elements.description: The result of the transaction: UNDEFINED, APPROVED, DECLINED, PROCESSED, FAILED, CANCELLED

elements.name: RequestedAmount
elements.description: The amount requested by the POS, as requested by the POS (i.e. no decimal point).

elements.name: GratuityAmount
elements.description: The gratuity amount entered by the cardholder, if any.

elements.name: GratuityPercentage
elements.description: The gratuity amount, as a percentage of the requested amount.

elements.name: TotalAmount
elements.description: The total of the gratuity and requested amount.

elements.name: Currency
elements.description: The currency code used for the transaction.

elements.name: TransactionID
elements.description: The transaction number used for this transaction, as maintained by the Eft Client.

elements.name: EFTTransactionID
elements.description: The EFT reference, given by the system, to make the transaction unique.

elements.name: OriginalEFTTransactionID
elements.description: The original EFT reference, given by the POS, as part of a VOID_SALE or a VOID_REFUND transaction.

elements.name: EFTTimestamp
elements.description: The date and time of the transaction, in ISO format (YYYYMMDDHHmmSS).

elements.name: AuthorisationCode
elements.description: The transaction authorization code, as given by the system.

elements.name: CVM
elements.description: The Cardholder Verfication Method:  UNDEFINED, SIGNATURE, PIN, PIN_SIGNATURE, FAILED, NOT_REQUIRED

elements.name: CardEntryType
elements.description: The card data acquisition type: UNDEFINED, MSR, ICC, CNP

elements.name: CardSchemeName
elements.description: The card, reported, scheme name.

elements.name: CardTypeId
elements.description: The ID of the Card Type.

elements.name: SerialNumber
elements.description: The serial number of the PED.

elements.name: BatteryStatus
elements.description: A number, followed by the % sign, which indicates current charge level of the battery.

elements.name: BatterymV
elements.description: An integer, which represent the batter charge, in mV.

elements.name: BatteryCharging
elements.description: Indicates whether the battery is charging, or not. Values are true or false.

elements.name: ExternalPower
elements.description: Indicates whether the PED is connected to an external power source (e.g. a AC adapter). Values are true or false.

elements.name: ApplicationName
elements.description: The name of the application running on the PED.

elements.name: ApplicationVersion
elements.description: A version string of the form major.minor.build‚Äù(e.g. 1.2.118).

elements.name: ErrorMessage
elements.description: Description of the error, if any.

elements.name: code
elements.description: Scanned code from the device in scanning mode.

elements.name: RecoveredTransaction
elements.description: Indicates that the transaction result is a recovered transaction. The key is only included if value is true.
